Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.gameboard

Class DevSpace

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.observer.Observable
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.gameboard.DevSpace
public class DevSpace
extends Observable
Class DevSpace represents the development space on the game board.

    • DevSpace

      public DevSpace​(java.lang.String nickname)
      Default constructor.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player who owns this DevSpace object

  • Method Details

    • notifyNew

      public void notifyNew​(java.lang.String nickname)
      Notifies a player's virtual view with a NewDevSpace message. Used when a player is reconnecting to a game.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player to notify

    • checkCards

      public boolean checkCards​(DevCard requirement)
      Checks if the player has a development card with the same colour and with a level equal or greater than the one provided.
      Parameters:
      requirement - the required development card
      Returns:
      true if the player has a development card that satisfies the requirement, false otherwise

    • addCard

      public void addCard​(DevCard card, DevSpaceSlot slot)
      Adds a development card on top of the selected slot in the development space and notifies all players' virtual views with a NewDevSpace message.
      Parameters:
      card - the card to add in the slot
      slot - the desired slot

    • checkPlace

      public boolean checkPlace​(int level, DevSpaceSlot slot)
      Checks if a selected slot has room for a card of a specified level.
      Parameters:
      level - the specified level
      slot - the development slot to check
      Returns:
      true if there is a place for a cord of that level, false otherwise

    • checkUpperCard

      public boolean checkUpperCard​(DevCard devCard)

    • getCards

      public java.util.List<java.util.List<DevCard>> getCards()
      Returns the list of lists of development cards contained in the development space.
      Returns:
      the list of lists of development cards

    • countCards

      public int countCards()
      Returns the number of development cards in the development space.
      Returns:
      the number of development cards in the development space
